class_f_04_dragon_01:
I do hope you’re all ready, because it is time for
your midterm exam! Focus and do your best![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_04_question_01:
1. What is the name of the gemstone that glows
    over a Pokémon’s head when it Terastallizes?

A) Tera Jewel
B) Tera Rock
C) Tera Stone
class_f_04_question_02:
2. When the answer to question 1 is in the shape
    of flowers, what type does it represent?

A) The Grass type
B) The Fire type
C) The Water type
class_f_04_question_03:
3. What shape are most snowflakes
    classified as?

A) Square
B) Hexagon
C) Octagon
class_f_04_question_04:
4. Where is the eatery that allows you to
    change a Tera Type?

A) Cabo Poco
B) Levincia
C) Medali
class_f_04_question_05:
5. What makes something beautiful?

A) Its shape and color
B) The eye of the beholder
C) I don’t know
D) There’s no correct answer
class_f_04_ansewer_05b: B) The eye of the beholder
class_f_04_dragon_03:
Time’s up! That’s it for today’s test.
Pencils down, please.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_04_dragon_04:
I would rather not have students worry about
passing or failing in my art class, but tests are\r
tests, after all...[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_04_dragon_05:
Anyway, good work, everyone! You can check
your results at the front desk.[VAR 0114(0012)]
